verses.text: Unless \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* build \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* labour \w in|strong="H3068"\w* vain \w that|strong="H3068"\w* build \w it|strong="H7725"\w*. Unless \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w the|strong="H0853"\w* city, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* watcheth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* vain \w that|strong="H3068"\w* keepeth \w it|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* vain \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* rise \w before|strong="H5973"\w* light, rise ye after \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* sitten, \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w the|strong="H0559"\w* bread \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow. \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* give sleep \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* beloved,

Behold \w the|strong="H3068"\w* inheritance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* children: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* reward, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* womb.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mighty, \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* shaken.

Blessed is \w the|strong="H2232"\w* man \w that|strong="H2232"\w* hath filled \w the|strong="H2232"\w* desire with them; he \w shall|strong="H1832"\w* not be confounded \w when|strong="H7114"\w* he \w shall|strong="H1832"\w* speak \w to|strong="H7440"\w* his enemies \w in|strong="H1832"\w* \w the|strong="H2232"\w* gate.
